release_notes:
- Version 1.1.3 Release
- Tarkov market feature - Compare trader prices vs flea market. Track restock timers & favorites. Add items as waiting for Tarkov trader restock.
- Quest Objectives - Toggle individual objectives. Added all Extract/transit quests and objectivesnow shown on map. Helper info visible for all Tarkov quests and tasks.
- Player marker size and direction of the player is now customizable with different sizes per-map basis.
- Fixes on notes feature for taking and saving notes per tarkov map and for general notes, now works similar to a notepad.
- Boss Filter - Select/deselect individual bosses per map.

Full patch notes available on discord
